net.jordaria.item

Class ItemPotion

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jordaria.item.Item
      • net.jordaria.item.ItemStackable
        • net.jordaria.item.ItemPotion

  • public class ItemPotion
extends ItemStackable
    An item subclass representing a potion with some effect. Potions are stackable.
    Author:
    Ches Burks
